actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide medicare benefits for individuals who require total parenteral nutrition (TPN).
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide Medicare benefits for individuals who require total parenteral nutrition.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide medicare benefits for individuals who require total parenteral nutrition (TPN).
